about_the_game:
From the visionary artist behind ABZÛ, The Pathless, and Journey – Sword of the Sea is an atmospheric adventure with highspeed movement inspired by skateboarding and snowboarding games.

Surf across the surreal undulating landscapes of the Necropolis on a quest to unveil a lost ocean teeming with life in Sword of the Sea

In a world where the terrain flows in waves, ride a hovering sword to speed over shifting seas of sand, magma, and ice. Build momentum to achieve great speeds and catch big air as you explore skatepark-like ruins, lost in the tides of the Necropolis. Your quest is to unveil the ancient sea buried beneath the land.

Unveil The Sea In A Uniquely Animating World

Explore vast otherworldly terrains of sand, lava, ice, and more that flow and shift in real time as you journey through the Necropolis. Discover the remnants of an ancient culture hidden in sinking tombs, mysterious shipwrecks, and petrified battlefields. Bring giant shoals of fish and creatures back to life on your quest to unveil the sea.

Awesome Hoversword Movement

The Hoversword controls like a snowboard, skateboard, and hoverboard all in one. Gain momentum to take epic leaps, go up walls, shred halfpipes, and carve your way forward to break through to higher and higher speeds. All the great feel of snowboarding and skating games, but in an entirely new context of adventure.

An Atmospheric Narrative

Experience a moving story told with color, light, music, and sparse dialogue. Follow the Wraith on his path of self discovery as he encounters enigmatic characters and searches for answers about the past.

Incredible Dynamic Music

Immerse yourself in an incredible score by industry legend Austin Wintory that morphs dynamically with gameplay to deliver music that reflects where you are on your journey.

  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Sound Card: Any
